titleStmt.title: The Kirk of Scotlands conclusion in defence of the Presbyteriall government, and discipline: with their intentions towards the King, the Queene, and the royall progeny: as also against heresies and schismes.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Edinburgh, and reprinted at London for R.A.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
